grails.plugins.rest.client.templated
[Groovy] Class XmlResourcesClient

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugins.rest.client.templated.AbstractResourcesClient
      grails.plugins.rest.client.templated.XmlResourcesClient

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class XmlResourcesClient
extends AbstractResourcesClient

A simple client for interacting with a REST web service exposed by a Grails application using XML as an interchange format

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
